txt.en: Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot

'Trolls fight. You die too fast. We strong where you weak.

'You go to troll-home now. Troll come here and fight. We win war. Take all. I send troll home when done.'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We smassh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
Slaughter More of the Free People
The trolls of Angmar have a singular vision, one that involves destroying the enemies of Angmar.
Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot and complete a patrol through the Ettenmoors as a Troll (Cost: 500 Commendations)

Taskmaster Sharkúlob is at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nThe trolls from Angmar, in an effort to speed the victory of Angmar's army, are willing to come to the Ettenmoors to fight the Free Peoplea in exchange for your services in the North. You should speak with Taskmaster Sharkúlob.
Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot

Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nYou took the place of a troll in Angmar while it wrought destruction against the forces of the Free Peoples in the Ettenmoors. You should speak with Taskmaster Sharkúlob.
